accountId.description: The AWS account ID for the S3 Storage Lens configuration. Defaults to automatically determined account ID of the AWS provider.

arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services organization.

encryption.description: Encryption of the metrics exports in this bucket. See Encryption below for more details.

outputSchemaVersion.description: The schema version of the export file. Valid values: `V_1`.

prefix.description: The prefix of the destination bucket where the metrics export will be delivered.
